title: Hybrid Champs That Must Happen
body:
[](http://i.imgur.com/CvOn3MQ.jpg)
{{champion:114}} First: \*obligatory shameless riposte\*
> [{quoted}](name=GetMariahCarried,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=0bzkuAFe,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-11-20T21:36:48.704+0000)
>
> http://i.imgur.com/CvOn3MQ.jpg[\img]
>
> Just to clarify, this is not:
> 
> * A skin line concept
> * The Christmas version of The Teemoing
> * Insanity
> * An easily implementable champion combo (given the two ability&#039;s associated with each key could just be combined/alternately cast) for some unspecified mix-mash gametype.
> 
> What it is, is ALL OF THE ABOVE. DO IT RIOT!

Second:

Now onto additions to this hybrid concept that are also obligatory. I unfortunately don't have the time to depict said masterpieces, but the world can no longer wait to know what it truly needs:

{{champion:122}} + {{champion:12}} => Dairyus (because I need an excuse to spell "Dairyus")
{{champion:80}} + {{champion:59}} => Spartan Well Generator (because the ult will give you nightmares)
{{champion:114}} + {{champion:24}} => Jax With a Real Weapon (I just had a terrible ranked game where Jax and I (Fiora) were arguing which champ was more annoying... this seems logical.)
{{champion:61}} + {{champion:134}} => BALLS (named NOT in homage of what this clearly is, but in homage of what you'll cuss every time you have to face BALLS.)
{{champion:131}} + {{champion:89}} => The One Who Knocks (Who's there? The sun. It burned you alive. Now you know. Ciao!)
{{champion:17}} + {{champion:45}} => Nobody's Innocent Anymore (or laughing)
{{champion:16}} + {{champion:62}} => Donkey Kong (Do I really have to explain?)
{{champion:143}} + {{champion:427}} => Bipolar Plant Thing (It just seemed necessary)
{{champion:240}} + {{champion:115}} => AAAAAAAAGGGGGGHHHHHH!!! (that's... that's his actual name)
{{champion:33}} + {{champion:54}} => Ok (Yeah)
{{champion:35}} + {{champion:7}} => WHAT IS THIS (Also in homage of what you'll say after facing this in a skirmish for 30 seconds.)

Feel free to include your own suggestions.

P.S. Oh, before I forget, there is ONE hybrid, {{champion:16}} + {{champion:62}}, that I have a fair depiction of:

https://media.giphy.com/media/IUu7swWWXfeyk/giphy.gif
